summary: The DATA Act seeks to improve the quality and comparability of federal spending data available to Congress and the public, and requires it to be posted on USAspending.gov . We found that data quality on USAspending.gov has improved since our 2017 review. However, varying interpretations of data standards lead to persistent data quality issues. Additionally, known data limitations are not fully disclosed. To help ensure...
title: Data Act: Quality of Data Submissions Has Improved but Further Action Is Needed to Disclose Known Data Limitations
